DOC.brief_summary: The purpose of this study is to find if Rituximab can improve severe ocular lesions of Behcet's Disease.
DOC.brief_title: Rituximab for the Treatment of Severe Ocular Manifestations of Behcet's Disease
DOC.detailed_description: To test in a single blind randomized control study the efficacy of Rituximab versus combination of pulse cyclophosphamide and azathioprine. Both group receiving 0.5 mg/kg/daily prednisolone.
DOC.criteria: Behcet's Disease fulfilling the new International Criteria for Behcet's Disease Having active ocular lesions (posterior and/or retinal vasculitis) Resistant to cytotoxic drugs + prednisolone 0.5 mg/kg Visual acuity less than 1/10 on Snellen chart Antecedent of allergic reaction to any component of the therapeutic regimen
DOC.keyword: Ocular lesions, Visual Acuity, Retinal Vasculitis
